UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'ring-racers/7-Zip'; if (Test-Path '7z.exe') { exit 0 } else { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://7-zip.org/a/7z2409-x64.exe' -OutFile '7z-installer.exe' }; if ($?) { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://www.7-zip.org/a/7zr.exe' -OutFile '7zr.exe' }; if ($?) { & ./7zr.exe x -y -aoa 7z-installer.exe *> $null 2>&1; Remove-Item -Path '7z-installer.exe' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null }"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'ring-racers/server'; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri ((Invoke-RestMethod -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://api.github.com/repos/KartKrewDev/RingRacers/releases/latest').assets | Where-Object { $_.browser_download_url -match 'Dr\.Robotnik\.s-Ring-Racers-v.*-Installer\.exe$' })[0].browser_download_url -OutFile 'rrinstaller.exe'; & ../7-Zip/7z.exe x -y -aoa rrinstaller.exe | Out-Null; Remove-Item -Path 'rrinstaller.exe' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null"

-c "cd ring-racers/server && DownloadURL=$(wget -qO- https://api.github.com/repos/KartKrewDev/RingRacers/releases/latest | grep browser_download_url | cut -d\\\" -f4 | grep Dr\.Robotnik\.s-Ring-Racers-v.*-Installer\.exe$) && wget -qO rrinstaller.exe $DownloadURL && ../7-Zip/7zzs x -y -aoa rrinstaller.exe >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -f rrinstaller.exe >/dev/null 2>&1"
